titleStmt.title: Hosanna before the bishops preached to them when they were come to the tower / by Master Davis ... ; being the heads of his sermon as it taken by one of his hearers on Sunday morning being the second of Ianuary, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Davis, Chaplain to the Lord Cottington.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
